# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d32b-102">如何：从 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中移除自动生成的列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d32b-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="8d32b-103">当你<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件设置为自动生成基于其数据源中的数据列，则可以选择忽略某些列。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d32b-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d32b-104">您可以执行此操作通过调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>集合。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d32b-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d32b-105">或者，可以通过设置隐藏视图中的列<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>属性设置为`false`。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d32b-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="8d32b-106">你想要在某些情况下，显示隐藏的列或列中的数据访问而不会显示它所需时，此方法很有用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d32b-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d32b-107">若要删除自动生成的列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d32b-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="8d32b-108">调用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A>方法<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A>集合。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d32b-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="8d32b-109">若要隐藏自动生成的列</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d32b-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="8d32b-110">设置列的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A>属性设置为`false`。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d32b-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

-   <span data-ttu-id="8d32b-114">一个<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>名为控件`dataGridView1`绑定到包含某个表`Fax`并`CustomerID`列，如`Customers`Northwind 示例数据库中的表。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d32b-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="8d32b-115">对 <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> 和 <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> 程序集的引用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="8d32b-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
